sentence: Climate risk assessments seek to understand the nature and level of climate risks on an exposed territory by determining the probability of occurrence of climate-related events (e.g. droughts, floods, windstorms) and slow-onset events (e.g. increased temperature, changing weather patterns) and their impacts at the subnational and local levels.

Climate risk assessments seek to understand the nature and level of climate risks on an exposed territory by determining the probability of occurrence of climate-related events (e.g. droughts, floods, windstorms) and slow-onset events (e.g. increased temperature, changing weather patterns) and their impacts at the subnational and local levels.

The LOCAL Facility supports undertaking of localized climate risk assessments to understand the nature and level of climate risks on an exposed territory by determining the probability of occurrence of climate-related events (e.g. droughts, floods, windstorms) and slow-onset events (e.g. increased temperature, changing weather patterns) and their impacts at the subnational and local levels.
